Title: McKenna Shoots for the Stars
Writer: Mary Casanova (based on: The McKenna Stories by), Jessica O'Toole (teleplay), Amy Rardin (teleplay)
Actors: Jade Pettyjohn, Kerris Dorsey, Nia Vardalos, Ian Ziering
Plot: American Girl McKenna comes to life in this modern-day adventure about a determined gymnast who must focus on her strengths to overcome challenges and find a way to believe in herself again.
